homesection.intro: A Full Stack Software Engineer and a Passionate Learner.

aboutsection._skillscomment: Put svg files with the same name as in skills list. You can download logos from https://www.iconfinder.com/, https://www.vectorlogo.zone/
aboutsection.careerdetails: I have completed Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) in Electronics and Communication Enginnering from Academy of Technology, Hooghly.

certificates.name: AWS Certified Cloud Practioner
certificates.details: I have completed AWS Cloud Practioner certification on April, 2023. By completing this certificate I achieved following technical milestone,
learningpoints: I've acquired a comprehensive understanding of basic AWS Cloud architectural principles, enabling me to design and deploy scalable and reliable cloud solutions.
I've mastered key AWS services, such as EC2, S3, RDS, and IAM, learning their functionalities, use cases, and best practices for implementation.
I've learned essential AWS security practices and compliance measures.

projects.name: Inventroy Manager
projects.details: This is an Android application to manage the inventory of a small-scale business. Built using firebase backend. It uses QR code based recording system to keep track of inventory.Implemented a QR code generator based on product details and a QR code scanner using Zxing library to identify the product and add/remove it automatically from the stock

projects.name: Employee Management System
projects.details: This is a web-based employee management and attendance management system using Spring boot, AngularJS. Using this admin can keep record of existing employees in a company and can also onboard new employees. Employees can use this to give daily attendance which will be montiored by admin and admin get a report of employees with low attendance
